body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TrRels ↔((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧ c0 ∈ Rels))
⊣ TrRels = { hs0 ∈ Rels |(hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0 }
⊣ (hs0 = c0 →((hs0 ∘ hs0)⊆ hs0 ↔(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0))
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, Rels)
⊣ d(hs0,(c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0)
